dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: This dataset represents the coal mining process at M coal mine, with an annual production capacity of 1.2 million tons. It is suited for depicting the environmental impact and energy consumption in the coal supply chain, especially relevant for industries relying on coal as a primary energy source or raw material. Examples of end-use applications for the coal extracted might include electricity generation, metallurgical processes for steel production, or as feedstock for chemical synthesis.
该数据集代表了M煤矿的煤炭开采过程，年产量为120万吨。该数据集适用于描述煤炭供应链中的环境影响和能源消耗，特别适用于依赖煤炭作为主要能源或原材料的行业。煤炭的最终用途包括发电、钢铁生产的冶金过程或作为化学合成的原料。

locationOfOperationSupplyOrProduction.descriptionOfRestrictions: The annual output of M coal mine is 1.2 million tons, and the actual working time is 360 days per year, so the working face needs 499 days to complete the mining. In the mining process of a working face in M coal mine, the time of installation and withdrawal of equipment is half a month respectively. In one year of production, the time of excavation is 11 months, and the time of mining is 10 months.
M 煤矿的年产量为120万t，每年实际工作时间按360d计，则该工作面共需 499d开采完成。M煤矿一个工作面的开采过程中，设备的安装与撤回的时间各为半个月，在一年的生产中，掘进的时间为11个月，回采的时间为10个月。

technology.technologicalApplicability: This dataset represents the coal mining process at M coal mine, with an annual production capacity of 1.2 million tons. It is suited for depicting the environmental impact and energy consumption in the coal supply chain, especially relevant for industries relying on coal as a primary energy source or raw material. Examples of end-use applications for the coal extracted might include electricity generation, metallurgical processes for steel production, or as feedstock for chemical synthesis.
该数据集代表了M煤矿的煤炭开采过程，年产量为120万吨。该数据集适用于描述煤炭供应链中的环境影响和能源消耗，特别适用于依赖煤炭作为主要能源或原材料的行业。煤炭的最终用途包括发电、钢铁生产的冶金过程或作为化学合成的原料。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When using this LCA data of M coal mine's process, it is important to take into account adjustments for regional differences in mining practices if applied to a different geographic location. The expected functional lifespan of heavy machinery used in extraction and the treatment of mine-related environmental burdens like land use and water consumption should also be included. Methodological advice includes a careful consideration of methodological boundaries for included emissions, and an accurate allocation of burdens between co-products if applicable.
使用M煤矿开采过程的LCA数据时，如果适用于不同的地理位置，重要的是要考虑采矿实践的地域差异进行调整。还应包括重型机械使用寿命的预期功能以及与矿山相关的环境负担（如土地使用和水消耗）的处理。方法论建议包括对包含排放的方法学界限的仔细考虑，以及如果适用，则对共产品之间负担的准确分配。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: Based on the time schedule of each stage in the full life cycle of coal mining in M ​​Coal Mine and the mining time of the entire working face, the power consumption of coal mining in the full life cycle of this working face is calculated.
根据M煤矿煤炭开采全生 命周期内各个阶段的时间进度安排以及整个工作面的开采时间,计算得出这一工作面开采的全生命周期中煤炭回采的电力消耗量。

Based on the time schedule of each stage in the full life cycle of coal mining in M ​​Coal Mine and the mining time of the entire working face, the CO2 emissions generated by the consumption of 97509.62mw·h of electricity in coal mining during the full life cycle of mining in this working face were calculated. quantity.
根据M煤矿煤炭开采全生 命周期内各个阶段的时间进度安排以及整个工作面的开采时间,计算得出这一工作面开采的全生命周期中煤炭回采中消耗97509.62mw·h的电量产生的CO2排放量。
